extension.description: This is the python package translatepy and it's dependencies packed for Kodi plus a view extras to perform automatic translation subtitles from various online translation services.[CR] Automatic translation translates to the preferred subtitle language as set in Settings > Player > Language, section Subtitles[CR] Video addons have to actively support this addon to allow automatic translation. Currently, viwX is the only addon known to do so.
